title: Up & Down Balance and Movement for Singing
desc: Find and integrate ideal balance of each area of the body for singing in this workshop. Also, you will find your individual movement style for singing support. We will start with warm-ups the BreathingRx way and progress to finding optimal balance and movement for you in your body as a singer in a fun group coached exercise!  Singers, voice teachers, actors and speakers are invited to come and gain an appreciation about why this work is setting a new standard for vocal support. And, it also increases your expressiveness and joy!  This workshop will be filmed to be turned into an e-course product and for your participation you will be given access to all 6 workshops for your continued study.  I have designed this 3rd workshop in a series of 6 so you can be individually attended it and receive a lot of benefit. Registration is limited so book your seat now. Bring a song you know weill. Please arrive on time. Contact me if you have any other questions.
